text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende B\\u221a\\u00bacher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-B\\u221a\\u00bachlein f\\u221a\\u00bar Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v\\u221a\\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche B\\u221a\\u00bacher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>. Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>de\\u221a\\u00fcselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-G\\u221a\\u00a7rtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v\\u221a\\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-H\\u221a\\u00bahner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und f\\u221a\\u00banffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v\\u221a\\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schl\\u221a\\u00bassel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v\\u221a\\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":3,"explanation":"Fixed malformed XML nesting: the Johann Arndt <BIBL> entry was not closed before a following <BIBL> began (created nested BIBL). I closed the Arndt <BIBL> and made the subsequent 'Item' and following <BIBL> a separate entry. I also moved the standalone 'Item' text out of any inner <BIBL> so it appears as inter-entry text. All original textual content and original Unicode escape sequences were preserved (backslashes escaped for JSON)."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende B\u221a\u00bacher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-B\u221a\u00bachlein f\u221a\u00bar Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v\u221a\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche B\u221a\u00bacher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>. Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>de\u221a\u00fcselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-G\u221a\u00a7rtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8v\u221a\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-H\u221a\u00bahner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und f\u221a\u00banffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8v\u221a\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schl\u221a\u00bassel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8v\u221a\u2264</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: Fixed malformed XML nesting: the Johann Arndt <BIBL> entry was not closed before a following <BIBL> began (created nested BIBL). I closed the Arndt <BIBL> and made the subsequent 'Item' and following <BIBL> a separate entry. I also moved the standalone 'Item' text out of any inner <BIBL> so it appears as inter-entry text. All original textual content and original Unicode escape sequences were preserved (backslashes escaped for JSON).
